Hyper Checkout
HyperCheckout
A ready-to-use, scalable payment page with a pre-built UI. Simplify setup, integrate multiple payment methods, and ensure secure transactions without extensive UI development.

Express Checkout SDK
Express Checkout SDK
Boost transaction success rates with a flexible, UI-less Native SDK. Create a custom user interface to align with your brand and simplify integration. UI development required.

Express Checkout API
Simplify payments with our API solution. Seamless integration and management, no SDK required. User-friendly payment flow across web and app platforms.

Payment Page Signature

Strengthen your existing Juspay products
Explore add-on Features
Quick Pay
QuickPay revolutionizes checkout with a context-specific single payment option, enabling quicker checkouts, targeted payment method, and higher success rates.
DOTP
DOTP (Direct OTP) or Native OTP simplifies card authentication by allowing buyers to enter the OTP directly on the merchant's website/app, eliminating redirection.
Split Settlements
Efficiently split order amounts across multiple accounts for flexible payment management in various business verticals or marketplace models.
Outages
Stay informed about payment method downtimes with real-time notifications. Our algorithm monitors failures based on global success rates for smooth payments.
Offers Engine
Maximize conversions and engagement with Juspay's Offers Engine. Create tailored campaigns, track performance, and provide a rewarding payment experience.
Surcharge
Effortlessly manage surcharges for various payment methods, ensuring compliance and boosting revenue. Enhance experiences with transparent and convenient payments.
Payment Locking
Customize payment instrument selection to enhance security and streamline transactions. Block or allow specific instruments for a seamless user experience.
Merchant's in-house Wallet
Seamlessly integrate your custom wallet with Juspay's payment infrastructure for a convenient user experience.
EMI
Boost conversions and customer satisfaction with EMI, offering convenient installment payment options to customers and greater flexibility to customers.
Payment Links
Customize payment links for a personalized payment experience. Align the payment process with your brand and simplify transactions.
Product Summary
Product summary streamlines the purchase process by presenting a concise & informative overview of the product to users.

Our Resources got you covered
Payment Method Integrations
Widen your payment selections for added customer flexibility. Explore New Payment Method Integrations
Payment Forms
Streamline your payment process, enhance the customer experience, and boost your business's success.
Dashboard
Simplify payment ops with our intuitive dashboard. Manage transactions, access analytics, and optimize your checkout process with ease.
Error Codes
Gain insights into the error codes associated with our SDK, empowering you to troubleshoot and resolve issues effectively.
Refunds
A comprehensive guide on processing refunds, equipping merchants with the knowledge and best practices to efficiently handle refund requests.
Release Notes
Stay up to date with our product enhancements, new features, bug fixes, and improvements through our comprehensive release notes.
Gateways & Aggregators
Explore our supported gateways and aggregators, enabling you to choose the right partners for your payment processing needs.
Test Resources
Access a range of resources and tools specifically designed for testing and validating your integrations, ensuring a robust and reliable system.
Pre-Auth and Capture
Optimize payment flow with Pre-Auth & Capture. Authorize upfront, capture later, and enhance customer experience while reducing risks.
Dynamic Routing
Optimize gateway selection with Juspay's dynamic routing. Boost success rates and conversions by considering gateway performance, health and costs.
3DS 2.0 Protocol for Card Payments
Overview of 3DS 2.0 Protocol Readiness for card transactions across Juspay's Partner Ecosystem.
Pay-V3
Power your card checkout experience with Pay-V3, a secure and customizable JavaScript integration designed for non-PCI DSS compliant merchants.
